entry.title: Troxel Capriole English Helmet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Helmets
Price: 59.95

The Capriole is the perfect everyday helmet for the beginner show rider, and with its excellent ventilation, it is also the answer for a show appearance in hot weather!

Size: Small (up to 21-1/2"), Medium (22" - 22-3/4"), and Large (22-3/4"+)

These are a warehouse find. These helmets may have minor imperfections or may be missing their original packaging. These have not been used.

entry.title: Hair Bun with Sparkling Crystals
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Breeches
Price: 9.95

These sparkling scrunchie bun hair covers are sure to draw attention to you. They are adorned with glittering crystals and also feature two hidden mini-comb clips to hold them securely in place so they won't fall off while you're riding.  Available in ten colors. One size fits all.

  • Adorned with glittering crystals
  • Two hidden mini-comb clips to hold securely in place
  • Available in ten colors
  • One size fits all

entry.title: Troxel Sierra Western Helmets
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Helmets
Price: 114.95

Engineered to withstand the toughest terrain, the Sierra’s nylon and leather covering looks good while protecting the shell from scratches. The comfortable, self-adjusting SureFit™ Pro system and Air-Channel ™ headliner perform flawlessly to provide all day comfort on the trail or in the arena.

Key features include:

  • Low profile
  • Rugged leather & nylon covering
  • Mesh-covered vents
  • SureFit™ Pro fit system
  • FlipFold™ removable washable headliner with Air-Channel™ technology
  • ASTM/SEI-certified

entry.title: Troxel Liberty Series Low Profile Riding Helmet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Helmets
Price: 59.95

Ultralight, low profile helmet with large vents providing superior ventilation for a cooler, more comfortable ride. With a DialFit™ comfort system and removable and washable headliner with FlipFold shims for personal fit options, the Liberty is a great option for all types of riding disciplines.

Key features include:

  • Low profile
  • Durable, lightweight construction
  • Six mesh covered vents
  • DialFit™ system
  • NEW XS size
  • FlipFold™ removable washable headliner with Air-Channel™ technology
  • ASTM/SEI-certified

entry.title: Derby Kids Suede Leather Half Chaps Elastic & Zipper
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Half Chaps
Price: 29.95

Give your young rider the look and feel of tall boots, without the expense! These suede leather half chaps have a tapered leg with an elastic panel for a close, comfortable fit. Elasticized area gives about 1/2" to 3/4" stretch for comfort and fit. A best rated product for over 6 years!

Size X-Small: 11 1/5 " Height at back of the knee, 9" Calf (measure the widest part)
  • Made with suede leather and heavy zippers
  • Elastic stirrups and snaps at ankles
  • Elasticized tapered leg for the perfect fit
  • Elasticized area gives about 1/2" stretch for comfort

entry.title: Derby Originals Kids Black Leather Show Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Gloves
Price: 4.95

Great for every use or outdoor activities in cold weather. Excellent for horse riding and shows!
Made of soft and breathable genuine leather with lycra side panels finger reinforcement. Velcro and elastic closure at the wrist to ensure snugness. A great glove for a great price.

Measure around your hand at the widest part, excluding the thumb. The number of inches should equal your glove size.

Sizes:
•Small (6-1/2" to 7")

  •  Velcro and elastic closure at the wrist to ensure snugness
  •  Use to keep warm

entry.title: Derby Originals Adult and Childrens Suede Leather Half Chaps with Full Length Zippers & Elastic for Horseback Riding or Motorcycle Use
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Half Chaps
Price: 24.95 - 34.95 (10 variants)

Derby Originals’ half chaps feature high-quality materials and are carefully constructed to ensure the best fit possible, and produce attractive half chaps that will last for many years to come. Whether you’re looking for a new pair of chaps to wear over your breeches, jodhpurs, or jeans, or are simply looking to make a fashion statement, Derby Originals has a wide assortment of options to suit your needs!

 

Features

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - these half chaps are made with a high-quality suede material that is soft to the touch and will not fade when washed and features sturdy elastic stirrups, and sturdy snap and buckle closures.

MULTIPLE SIZES - these chaps run smaller than average, so we recommend ordering 1-2 sizes up from your typical half-chap size. These chaps are available in Small, Medium, Large, X-Large, and XX-Large.

ELASTIC STRETCH FIT - these half chaps feature elasticized areas on each leg that allow for between ½” to ¾” of stretchability to the material to ensure the best fit possible.

PROTECTS YOUR PANTS - these half chaps are perfect for protecting your breeches, jodhpurs, or jeans from wear and tear during horseback riding or when riding motorcycles. They also make an attractive fashion statement.

NOT JUST FOR RIDERS - these half chaps are ideal for both English or Western riders, but beyond that, they’re also ideal for motorcyclists, for use in costumes, or as a fashionable accessory to everyday boots.

 

Sizing

entry.title: Heritage Pro-Flow Summer Show Riding Gloves Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Heritage Gloves
Type: Gloves
Price: 27.95

We know that at some events during summer it can get really warm in show clothes waiting for your event to begin. That is why we have developed this unique show glove for those hot days. This show glove is the first of its kind to be fully ventilated with a mesh top and air holes on the palm side of the glove. This glove is made with the best grade of soft Cabretta sheepskin leather.

  • Stretchable Coolmax® Mesh top panel to allow free air flow.
  • Stretchable Coolmax® Nylon flex panels along fingers and hand provide a comfortable fit.
  • Patented Rein Cut™ design us patent number 7,281,275.
  • Double stitched critical outward seams.
  • Wrap around leather reinforced index finger.
  • Genuine Cabretta leather palm.
  • Elastic band strips hold glove securely in place.

entry.title: Heritage Spectrum Show Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: Heritage
Type: Gloves
Price: 33.95

The Heritage Spectrum Show glove offers a comfortable custom fit with a stretchable flex panel across your knuckles and adjustable strap closure. This glove is also made with exclusive Heritage breathable "Spectrum Suede" synthetic suede leather to help increase your sensitivity control and grip of the reins. "Spectrum Suede" is designed to be breathable and permeate the perspiration from your skin out at the same time maintaining a perfect grip. This special material is also machine washable.

 

  • Patented Rein Cut™ design us patent number 7,281,275.
  • Breathable “Spectrum Suede” synthetic suede leather.
  • Double stitched critical outward seams.
  • Stretchable flex knuckle panels for comfortable fit.
  • Adjustable strap closure.
